mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_huiyuan( user_name, password, code, del, email, creat_date, user_bz, tx, tel )VALUES ( #{userName}, #{password}, #{code}, '0', #{email}, NOW(), #{userBz}, #{tx}, #{tel} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_huiyuan SET password = #{password} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT count(id) FROM t_huiyuan WHERE email=#{email} and del ='0'
SELECT count(id) FROM t_huiyuan WHERE tel=#{tel} and del ='0'
SELECT id FROM t_huiyuan WHERE user_name =#{userName} and ( tel=#{tel} or email = #{tel}) and del ='0'
